website_summaries.verdict: A top-notch infield glove for young ballplayers.
pros: Buffalo leather construction provides immense durability
Sold game-ready, which means there is no need to break in the glove
Available in left-hand and right-hand options
cons: Designed for children and little leaguers

customer_reviews.title: ... glove so we chose this one and it worked great for him this past baseball season
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old son needed a bigger glove so we chose this one and it worked great for him this past baseball season. Doesn't look worn and has stayed together really well. Good quality. Would def buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Mkelly

customer_reviews.title: Very soft leather...not in a good way.
customer_reviews.text: My son has used the glove now in over forty games.Glove has been okay and broke in easily BUT it doesn't have a nice,round pocket like you want a glove to have.It’s “natural crease” makes the pocket a lot smaller which is frustrating.I’ve tried all the tricks (tying ball in glove,oil,rubber mallet) but this is only glove out of MANY that’s done this.Already bought him a better quality glove for next season.
customer_reviews.author: JSB12

customer_reviews.title: Stick with a Rawlings!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t normally comment, BUT....after a lengthy break in period, oil and everything you’re “Supposed” to do to break in a glove, it didnt work for this glove. The webbing in this glove is stiff and doesn’t allow my 10 year old to squeeze and hold onto the baseball. I switched to a Rawlings glove, and he had ZERO issues. I thought it was my son, turns out it was the glove. Be cautious if you buy this glove...you to may be disappointed....
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Great Mitt
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect gift, the glove fit perfectly and was already mostly broken in. We are gonna get a lot of use out of this for years to come
customer_reviews.author: Hal Hanna

customer_reviews.title: Great glove!
customer_reviews.text: It's very soft and will be easy to break in. Good quality and fits my 9 yr old great.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Broken in
customer_reviews.text: My son lives it. Finally got him to replace his old glove. Nice Deep pocket and already feels broken in
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great glove
customer_reviews.text: Great quality glove. Easy to close for my 6 year old Leftie.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle D

customer_reviews.title: Good Glove
customer_reviews.text: Fit as advertised, my 7 year old likes the glove so far.
customer_reviews.author: APL_Review

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Soft. A little too smal for an adult woman. (I am 5'5" and weigh 115.)
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great starter glove for the money
customer_reviews.text: The best part about glove at the low price and the fact that the glove feels broken in almost instantly. Under heavy use it can last about 2 seasons, which is fine since your boy will outgrow it by then anyways. Again for the price it has a very good fit and finish. I bought two of them.
customer_reviews.author: Matt S.

customer_reviews.title: Good for me.
customer_reviews.text: Good for the price, easy to break and it's small for the purpose of an infildier player.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel A. Vindiola Robles

customer_reviews.title: He is a lefty so it’s harder to find him a good glove and not pay a ridiculous price
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old LOVES this glove and especially for the price! He is a lefty so it’s harder to find him a good glove and not pay a ridiculous price. It’s pretty soft already so after a little breaking in from use, he is good to go!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice glove to start. Kids do not need more of that
customer_reviews.author: Andrea C.

product_meta.title: Louisville Slugger 11.5-Inch FG Genesis Baseball Infielders Glove
product_meta.description: When your young ballplayer is ready to go right now, the Genesis is waiting for them. Built specifically for youth players and featuring buffalo leather and performance mesh, the Genesis series has a traditional, yet game-ready feel right off the shelf. - See more at: slugger.com/gloves/baseball-gloves/genesis-1884/genb1200.aspx#sthash.sEKpF1cH.dpuf.
